document.full_text: the main option under consideration for greece now is a voluntary deal by investors to maintain their greek bond holdings over the period of another eu/imf program from 2011 to 2014, euro zone sources said.
document.title: eu to seek bank commitment to hold greek debt: sources
lines_and_colors: the main option under consideration for greece now is a voluntary deal by investors to maintain their greek bond holdings over the period of another eu/imf program from 2011 to 2014, euro zone sources said.
